alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Johnson; Leavenworth; Miami; Wyandotte (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued December 15 at 6:02PM CST until December 15 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 564 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL KANSAS JOHNSON KS MIAMI IN NORTHEAST KANSAS ATCHISON KS LEAVENWORTH WYANDOTTE IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSOURI CALDWELL DAVIESS IN NORTHWEST MISSOURI BUCHANAN CLINTON DEKALB IN WEST CENTRAL MISSOURI CASS CLAY JACKSON PLATTE RAY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ATCHISON, BELTON, BRAYMER, BRECKENRIDGE, CAMERON, CLARKSDALE, EXCELSIOR SPRINGS, FORT LEAVENWORTH, GALLATIN, GLADSTONE, HAMILTON, HARRISONVILLE, INDEPENDENCE, JAMESPORT, KANSAS CITY, KANSAS CITY KANSAS, KEARNEY, LANSING, LATHROP, LAWSON, LEAVENWORTH, LENEXA, LIBERTY, LOUISBURG, MAYSVILLE, OLATHE, OSAWATOMIE, OSBORN, OVERLAND PARK, PAOLA, PARKVILLE, PLATTE CITY, PLATTSBURG, PLEASANT HILL, POLO, RAYMORE, RICHMOND, RIVERSIDE, SHAWNEE, ST. JOSEPH, ST. JOSEPH AIRPORT, STANLEY, STEWARTSVILLE, UNION STAR, WEATHERBY LAKE, AND WESTON.
